main.java.embl.rieslab.emu.uiexamples.htsmlm.autopilot.finder

Interface FocusFinderInterface<O>

  • Type Parameters:
    O - Class representing the type of 'position'
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DetrendingFocusFinder, ImageBrightnessFilterFocusFinder, RegionVotingFocusFinder, RobustThielSenFocusFinder, SimpleFocusFinder

    public interface FocusFinderInterface<O>
    Interface for all focus finder classes. You add images and their 'position' to a focus finder and then query the best 'position' (e.g. the z position) according to to how 'sharp' i.e. focused are the images. A focus finder can be reused by calling clear. A focus finder should cache the result of the sharpness computations by keeping track of the addition of new images with respect to calls to geBestposition or getBestFocusMeasure or getFocusAmplitude.
    Author:
    royer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double addImage(O pPosition, DoubleArrayImage pDoubleArrayImage)
      Adds an image at a given position.
      void clear()
      Clears this focus finder from all added images.
      double getBestFocusMeasure()
      Returns the focus measure corresponding to the sharpest image.
      O getBestPosition()
      Returns the position that corresponds to the sharpest image.
      double getFocusAmplitude()
      Returns the amplitude of variation of the focus measure values over all added images.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name of this focus finder.
      void removeImage(O pPosition)
      Removes an image from the focus finder.

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clears this focus finder from all added images. The state of the focus finder is the same as when it was just created.

      • addImage

              DoubleArrayImage pDoubleArrayImage)

        pDoubleArrayImage - image
        Returns:
